strategy_used: Graph Strategy: We are at the very start of the investigation with zero queries or data collected. The highest-priority gaps are: (1) establishing a baseline of public information and official statements about Trump’s health, (2) locating the primary accounts/people (Trump, his physicians, White House/Team accounts) that produce authoritative claims, and (3) mapping conversation and influence around those claims. The most coherent next action is a coordinated first-round data sweep using multiple complementary endpoints: broad topical searches to surface the latest claims and media, targeted pulls of primary accounts for official messaging, and a trends/network check to prioritize where to dig deeper. This uses diverse endpoints (search, timeline, screenname, followers, trends) so we don’t rely solely on search.php and we produce threads to connect into deeper conversation analysis next round.
